verses.verse: And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> out of Acacia <S%H7851><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> to spy <S%H7270><s%> secretly <S%H2791><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> view <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, even Jericho <S%H3405><s%>. And they went <S%H3212><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> into a harlot <S%H2181><s%>'s house <S%H802><s%>, named <S%H8034><s%> Rahab <S%H7343><s%>, and lodged there <S%H7901><s%>.

And it was told <S%H559><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H935><s%>, there came men <S%H582><s%> in here to night <S%H3915><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to search out <S%H2658><s%> the country <S%H776><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to Rahab <S%H7343><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> that have come <S%H935><s%> to you <S%H935><s%>, which have entered into your house <S%H1004><s%>: for they have come <S%H935><s%> to search out <S%H2658><s%> all the country <S%H776><s%>.

And the woman <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and hid <S%H6845><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, and said, There came <S%H935><s%> men <S%H582><s%> to me <S%H3045><s%>, but I knew not where they came from <S%H370><s%>.

And it came to pass about the time of the shutting <S%H5462><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, when it was dark <S%H2822><s%>, that the men <S%H582><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%>: where the men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H7291><s%>: pursue after <S%H310><s%> them quickly <S%H4118><s%>; for you shall overtake them <S%H5381><s%>.

But she had brought them up <S%H5927><s%> to the roof <S%H1406><s%> of the house <S%H2934><s%>, and hid them with the stalks <S%H6086><s%> of flax <S%H6593><s%>, which she had laid in order <S%H6186><s%> upon the roof <S%H1406><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them the way <S%H1870><s%> to Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to the fords <S%H4569><s%>: and as soon as they which pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them were gone out <S%H3318><s%>, they shut <S%H5462><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%>.
And before they were laid down <S%H7901><s%>, she came up <S%H5927><s%> to them on the roof <S%H1406><s%>;

And she said <S%H559><s%> to the men <S%H582><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the land <S%H776><s%>, and that your terror <S%H367><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> upon us <S%H3427><s%>, and that all the inhabitants of the land <S%H776><s%> faint <S%H4127><s%> because of you <S%H6440><s%>.

For we have heard <S%H8085><s%> how the Lord <S%H3068><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> for you <S%H6440><s%>, when you came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and what you did <S%H6213><s%> to the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, that were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%>, whom you utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%>.

And as soon as we had heard <S%H8085><s%> these things <S%H3824><s%>, our hearts did melt <S%H4549><s%>, neither did there remain <S%H6965><s%> any more courage <S%H7307><s%> in any man <S%H376><s%>, because <S%H6440><s%> of you <S%H3068><s%>: for the Lord your God <S%H430><s%>, he is God <S%H430><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, and in earth beneath <S%H776><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H7650><s%>, I pray you, swear unto me by the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, since <S%H3588><s%> I have showed <S%H6213><s%> you kindness <S%H2617><s%>, that you will also show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> me a true <S%H571><s%> token <S%H226><s%>:

And that you will save alive <S%H2421><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and my mother <S%H517><s%>, and my brothers <S%H251><s%>, and my sisters <S%H269><s%>, and all that they have <S%H5337><s%>, and deliver our lives <S%H5315><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> her <S%H5315><s%>, Our life for yours <S%H4191><s%>, if you utter <S%H5046><s%> not this our business <S%H1697><s%>. And it shall be <S%H3068><s%>, when the Lord has given <S%H5414><s%> us the land <S%H776><s%>, that we will deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly with you <S%H571><s%>.

Then she let them down <S%H3381><s%> by a cord <S%H2256><s%> through <S%H1157><s%> the window <S%H2474><s%>: for her house <S%H1004><s%> was upon the town <S%H7023><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%>, and she lived <S%H3427><s%> upon the wall <S%H2346><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3212><s%>, Get to the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, lest the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> meet <S%H6293><s%> you <S%H2247><s%>; and hide yourselves there three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, until the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> have returned <S%H7725><s%>: and afterward <S%H310><s%> may you go <S%H3212><s%> your way <S%H1870><s%>.
And the men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H5355><s%>, We will be blameless of this your oath <S%H7621><s%> which you have made us swear <S%H7650><s%>.

Unless <S%H935><s%>, when we come into the land <S%H776><s%>, you shall bind <S%H7194><s%> this line <S%H8615><s%> of scarlet <S%H8144><s%> thread <S%H2339><s%> in the window <S%H2474><s%> which you did let us down by <S%H3381><s%>: and you shall bring <S%H622><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>, and your mother <S%H517><s%>, and your brothers <S%H251><s%>, and all your father <S%H1><s%>'s household <S%H1004><s%>, into your house <S%H1004><s%>.

And it shall be <S%H834><s%>, that whoever shall go out <S%H3318><s%> of the doors <S%H1817><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%> into the street <S%H2351><s%>, his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and we will be guiltless <S%H5355><s%>: and whoever shall be with you in the house <S%H1004><s%>, his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on our head <S%H7218><s%>, if any hand is laid on him <S%H3027><s%>.
And if you utter <S%H5046><s%> this our business <S%H1697><s%>, then we will be quit <S%H5355><s%> of your oath <S%H7621><s%> which you have made us to swear <S%H7650><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%>, According unto your words <S%H1697><s%>, so be it <S%H7971><s%>. And she sent them away, and they departed <S%H3212><s%>: and she bound <S%H7194><s%> the scarlet <S%H8144><s%> line <S%H8615><s%> in the window <S%H2474><s%>.

And they went <S%H3212><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and stayed <S%H3427><s%> there three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, until the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> were returned <S%H7725><s%>: and the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> them throughout all the way <S%H1870><s%>, but found them not <S%H4672><s%>.

So the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%>, and descended <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and passed over <S%H5674><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and told <S%H5608><s%> him all things that happened them <S%H4672><s%>:

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Truly <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hands <S%H3027><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%>; for even all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> do faint <S%H4127><s%> because of us <S%H6440><s%>.
